text: Ayanavaram taluk is a taluk of the village in Chennai in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. It was formed in December 2013 from parts of the erstwhile Perambur-Purasawalkam taluk. It comprises the neighbourhoods of Ayanavaram, Kolathur and Peravallur. ==References== ===General=== * Taluks of Chennai district ===Specific=== Category:Taluks of Chennai district
title: Ayanavaram taluk
